title: Distributed Data Show Episode 57: Multi-cloud Challenges with Adron Hall and Patrick McFadin
description:
Patrick introduces new DataStax evangelist Adron Hall and they discuss the challenges of running distributed data across multiple cloud providers.

Highlights
1:12 The conversations keep resolving to mutli-cloud. Netflix is mult-region, but discuss where that’s going.
1:46 What are some of the real challenges?
2:52 Multi-cloud doesn’t just mean two different consoles.
3:16 Breaking down the challenges. Managing networks, load balancing, and more.
4:20 Breaking out of single cloud mindset, balancing by third party, in which ways?
4:44 At the client level, what does multi cloud mean for connecting and how?
6:45 Sometimes you just don’t watch your movie.
7:00 State of the application, or applications.
7:42 The array of choices and opportunities to manage state.
9:04 What about the security out in the browser, or client app?


ABOUT DATASTAX ENTERPRISE 6
DataStax  powers  the  Right-Now  Enterprise  with  the  always-on,  distributed  cloud  database  built  on  Apache  Cassandra™  and designed for hybrid cloud. DataStax Enterprise 6 (DSE 6) includes industry-leading performance, self-driving operational simplicity, and robust analytics.

Learn more at http://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-enterprise and https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-enterprise-6
